name: Goproxy ASG Migration .txt - Goproxy Node Selector Migration Steps:
description: This section outlines the steps to migrate the Goproxy application to a new Auto Scaling Group (ASG) with a new node selector. Goproxy is used to bypass API rate limits imposed by registry apps. The process involves creating a new ASG, deploying a new Goproxy instance with a new node selector, sharing the new node selector with developers, verifying that the old ASG is no longer being used, and finally decommissioning the old ASG and deployments in phases.
use_cases: Bypassing API rate limits imposed by registry apps
Migrating an application to a new infrastructure environment
Phased decommissioning of old infrastructure components
